entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:06 PM ADT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:06 PM ADT Tuesday 28 March 2023
